channel.title: Guthix - The RSPS you should be playing
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://gifyu.com/images/ezgif-14014124564d5d3.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hO1VA7U.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://guthixps.com/index.php"][img]http://i.imgur.com/8gLCMhD.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://guthixps.com/forums/"][img]http://i.imgur.com/3GUOXA1.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://guthixps.com/highscores.php"][img]http://i.imgur.com/FJDLp0x.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://guthixps.com/vote.php"][img]http://i.imgur.com/40Cu5rj.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://guthixps.com/donate.php"][img]http://i.imgur.com/KvKnYC7.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://guthixps.com/download.php"][img]http://i.imgur.com/Sx6Kxmm.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IHoo5KcbgZ0"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5fR0duq.png[/img][/URL] [img]http://i.imgur.com/E7KgpBm.png[/img]
Welcome to Guthix, we are an OSRS Eco/PK server with instant pking and with all the latest OSRS data/maps/everything. The Guthix development team is separate from Last Man Standing, but made by the same think tank that thought of Last Man Standing. With a very well thought out economy and with a goal of making the most perfect pking/combat experience, Guthix offer's a ton for any player, let it be a pker, a skiller, or bosser, blood money(currency) is obtainable from each of those.
Here is some media with just some of the thing's to offer, the problem is I am horrible at making thread's so bare with me, and just try to believe me that you enjoy this server.
[SPOILER=Media - Lots of images!] Lets start off with our home [img]http://i.imgur.com/uuRAM1j.png[/img] Right when you start, you should bank all your thing's and spawn yourself a setup [img]http://i.imgur.com/IO4OzRB.png[/img] But if you are not into pking, teleport to the skilling location and start your grind to the top [img]http://i.imgur.com/d2vc1Xr.png[/img] Here is a player sending me pic's from his pking experience, all of our combat formula's were made for last man standing, and they were calculated for week's to be the most perfect they could be [img]http://i.imgur.com/1cFurgq.png[/img] After you saved up enough blood money from pking, or skilling, or bossing you can spend it in any shop in the game, or in pk based shops. A lot of item's not in shops are obtainable from pvming,so pvming isn't devalued. [img]http://i.imgur.com/mLQ3XHy.png[/img] If you start having a large bank and want to organize, we have bank tab's with a searchable bank interface [img]http://i.imgur.com/9wJIJ89.png[/img] Here are some of our boss's. This is just a taste, with more being added, and lots more in-game already added. Each boss gives 45-55 blood money as drops [img]http://i.imgur.com/XbIi4hJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CddkmRp.png[/img] Slayer is fully operational, with task's, task canceling and the slayer master telling you the location of the tasks. Each npc gives 1-5 blood money straight into your inventory, so slayer also benefits you not only from rare drops, but by just gaining slayer exp in general. [img]http://i.imgur.com/3GYDRyg.png[/img] Also you can insure your pets for blood money for a one time fee of 2.5k! [img]http://i.imgur.com/LQt8ahx.png[/img] We also have a sneak peak of zeah, which will have our last man standing 5 v 5 v 5 v 5's with blood money rewards :) [img]http://i.imgur.com/M2Eek0v.png[/img] Here are some of our achievements [img]http://i.imgur.com/8Chx1bz.png[/img] In fight caves you will obtain a fire cape from 10 waves. Also you will get progress in a fight cave based achievement with all achievement rewards giving blood money based on tier. [img]http://i.imgur.com/jRvnen3.png[/img] We also have a vote store based on guthix color's, items here will benefit skiller's and pker's alike [img]http://i.imgur.com/sGrbfcB.png[/img] So what are you waiting for join now and get ready to play the RSPS you should of been playing a long time ago! [img]http://i.imgur.com/cgfVEaB.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
Download the client now at [url=http://guthixps.com/download.php]Guthix RSPS - Download page[/url] Join our community at [url=http://guthixps.com/forums/]Guthix Forums[/url]
Also check out our video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IHoo5KcbgZ0
In the end I just want to say thank you to everyone, this is the first RSPS I finished and am releasing, with another amazing one in the work's called Last Man Standng. I always wanted to own one and it was a lot of work to get here, but today on this day, this is the day I can say I own an RSPS an RSPS I am proud of. I really hope you guys enjoy Guthix, a lot of work has been put into it and I want to thank the development team from Guthix and Last Man Standing where we got a lot of our code from. Also the Guthix Team is very open to suggestions and feedback. We hope to see you on :). [/CENTER]

item.title: Guthix - The RSPS you should be playing
item.dc:creator: @guthixps guthixps
item.description:
@guthixps wrote:

[CENTER]

hO1VA7U.png700×148



E7KgpBm.png701×555

Welcome to Guthix, we are an OSRS Eco/PK server with instant pking and with all the latest OSRS data/maps/everything. The Guthix development team is separate from Last Man Standing, but made by the same think tank that thought of Last Man Standing. With a very well thought out economy and with a goal of making the most perfect pking/combat experience, Guthix offer’s a ton for any player, let it be a pker, a skiller, or bosser, blood money(currency) is obtainable from each of those.

Here is some media with just some of the thing’s to offer, the problem is I am horrible at making thread’s so bare with me, and just try to believe me that you enjoy this server.

[SPOILER=Media - Lots of images!]
Lets start off with our home

uuRAM1j.png1730×847

Right when you start, you should bank all your thing’s and spawn yourself a setup
IO4OzRB.png750×491

But if you are not into pking, teleport to the skilling location and start your grind to the top
d2vc1Xr.png1708×895

Here is a player sending me pic’s from his pking experience, all of our combat formula’s were made for last man standing, and they were calculated for week’s to be the most perfect they could be
1cFurgq.png776×536

After you saved up enough blood money from pking, or skilling, or bossing you can spend it in any shop in the game, or in pk based shops. A lot of item’s not in shops are obtainable from pvming,so pvming isn’t devalued.
mLQ3XHy.png1723×841

If you start having a large bank and want to organize, we have bank tab’s with a searchable bank interface
9wJIJ89.png747×455

Here are some of our boss’s. This is just a taste, with more being added, and lots more in-game already added. Each boss gives 45-55 blood money as drops
XbIi4hJ.png1721×809

CddkmRp.png1720×850

Slayer is fully operational, with task’s, task canceling and the slayer master telling you the location of the tasks. Each npc gives 1-5 blood money straight into your inventory, so slayer also benefits you not only from rare drops, but by just gaining slayer exp in general.
3GYDRyg.png745×491

Also you can insure your pets for blood money for a one time fee of 2.5k!
LQt8ahx.png745×463

We also have a sneak peak of zeah, which will have our last man standing 5 v 5 v 5 v 5’s with blood money rewards
M2Eek0v.png1645×926

Here are some of our achievements
8Chx1bz.png745×457

In fight caves you will obtain a fire cape from 10 waves. Also you will get progress in a fight cave based achievement with all achievement rewards giving blood money based on tier.
jRvnen3.png1711×789

We also have a vote store based on guthix color’s, items here will benefit skiller’s and pker’s alike
sGrbfcB.png752×456

So what are you waiting for join now and get ready to play the RSPS you should of been playing a long time ago!
cgfVEaB.png1739×773

[/SPOILER]

Download the client now at Guthix RSPS - Download page
Join our community at Guthix Forums

Also check out our video!

In the end I just want to say thank you to everyone, this is the first RSPS I finished and am releasing, with another amazing one in the work’s called Last Man Standng. I always wanted to own one and it was a lot of work to get here, but today on this day, this is the day I can say I own an RSPS an RSPS I am proud of. I really hope you guys enjoy Guthix, a lot of work has been put into it and I want to thank the development team from Guthix and Last Man Standing where we got a lot of our code from. Also the Guthix Team is very open to suggestions and feedback. We hope to see you on :).
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: Guthix - The RSPS you should be playing
